[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″][vc_column_text]Maverick Brewery is an 11,000 sq ft facility that features a 10-hectolitre brewhouse with eight 20-HL fermenters, a 400-seat restaurant, a bar and a retail store offering our latest brews.  The entire menu is fiercely local and offers an elevated culinary experience that features a chefs/brewmasters tasting menu with beer pairings, oyster bar, house made charcuterie and food that is created to compliment our beer offerings.

Return to our Web Development Portfolio & Pricing[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
